I got some time to check, and Saito makes his cameo appearance in the 
anime in Episode 19 ("Yuke! Yuke! Toccha Nippon Ichi!") and in the 
manga, he appears in Volume 2, page 234-235 of the bunko version (in 
the chapter called "Mougeiko Kaishi no Maki").

Hope that helps. But it really is only a small appearance. I don't 
know if it would be worth spending all that money on a DVD just for a 
short appearance.

Tatsuko
